[vc_row][vc_column column_width_percent=”80″ align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”887364″][vc_custom_heading text_size=”” sub_lead=”yes” sub_reduced=”yes” uncode_shortcode_id=”855831″ subheading=”Don’t waste it standing in line”]Time is money[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text animation=”bottom-to-top” uncode_shortcode_id=”213078″]Changes in the airline industry have created a demand for private jet travel. With access to hundreds of airports, a private aircraft can get you closer to your destination faster than any commercial airline.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row unlock_row_content=”yes” row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”0″ top_padding=”0″ bottom_padding=”4″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”159009″ el_class=”how_scheme”][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_single_image media=”14245″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”178843″ el_class=”how_scheme_pic”][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h3″ text_size=”” sub_lead=”yes” sub_reduced=”yes” uncode_shortcode_id=”245830″ subheading=”Total Traveltime: 5 hrs 15 min” el_class=”how_scheme_title top”]Commercial flights[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text uncode_shortcode_id=”143816″ el_class=”how_scheme_text how_scheme_text_1″]

2 hrs

Arrive at least 2 hours before flight, go through security, and make it to your gate to board the plane[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text align=”center” el_class=”how_scheme_text how_scheme_text_2″ uncode_shortcode_id=”134902″]

2.5 hrs

Hamburg – Ibiza[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text align=”center” el_class=”how_scheme_text how_scheme_text_3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”174133″]

45 min

Taxi to the gate, disembark the plane, walk to the baggage claim, find ground transportation[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html el_class=”how_time_container”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h3″ text_size=”” sub_lead=”yes” sub_reduced=”yes” uncode_shortcode_id=”791766″ subheading=”Total Traveltime: 2 hrs 45 min” el_class=”how_scheme_title bottom”]Private flight[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text align=”center” el_class=”how_scheme_text how_scheme_text_4″ uncode_shortcode_id=”971329″]

10 min

Board your aircraft[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text align=”center” el_class=”how_scheme_text how_scheme_text_5″ uncode_shortcode_id=”634781″]

2.5 hrs

Hamburg – Ibiza[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text align=”center” el_class=”how_scheme_text how_scheme_text_6″ uncode_shortcode_id=”562532″]

5 min

Disembark your aircraft and load into your private vehicle[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row unlock_row_content=”yes” row_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ fullwidth=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1649345079331{padding-right: 45px !important;padding-left: 45px !important;}” uncode_shortcode_id=”848277″ el_class=”custom_padding mk-fancy-table table-style2 table_advantages”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”892654″][vc_column_text uncode_shortcode_id=”181762″]

Owner / Fractional 25h card program App web Broker
Best negotiated prices
Discounted empty leg deals
App / Website booking
No minimum notice / urgent take-off (90′)
No long-term commitment / membership
Access to worldwide fleet
Access to all aircraft sizes
Group charter / ambulance
Limousine / hotel / restaurant bookings

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”3″ bottom_padding=”4″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”545819″ el_class=”container-team”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″ uncode_shortcode_id=”197859″][vc_custom_heading sub_lead=”yes” sub_reduced=”yes” uncode_shortcode_id=”520594″ subheading=”always at your service”]Our Team[/vc_custom_heading][uncode_block id=”104185″ inside_column=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

yoast_head_json.description: Book your private charter flights with Call a Jet to access a fleet of 12.000+ worldwide. No lon gterm commitment, no registration. Easy as it is.
